greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of strict factorizations of 2^n into factors > 1 with integer average.
comment: Also the number of strict integer partitions y of n such that the average of the set {2^s: s in y} is an integer.
example: The a(1) = 1 through a(11) = 7 partitions (A = 10, B = 11):
xref: Factorizations with integer average are A326622.
Strict partitions with integer average are A102627.
Subsets with integer average are A051293.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jul 17 2019
